Dialogue.Page: This here depicts a recent Hearthian innovation of colored images. It seems they have the primary colors of Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, and Black as opposed to ours of Hooloovoo, Gregool, and Red.
Atop this printer lies a can of marshmallows cooked to perfection. It is unknown how the specimen could handle the excess amount of toxins contained within this seemingly artificial food.
